page.title: 09RECREATION
page.content: Children spend their leisure time in various ways with many of the popular pursuits being unchanged over the years.These include{playing games, {swimming,reading,drawing and cycling.} Watching{T.V.}has now joined this list of old favourites.New activities are {computers and athletics.}The former is a sign of advancing technology both in the home and at school,while the interest in athletics stems partly from the influence of T.V. r in the case of this area the success of{Steve {Cram}and the popularity of the{Great {North Run}which passes through the area.The local{Youth Club}is quite popular offering various sporting activities and regular{Disco dances.} Old leisure pursuits such as{model {making}and organisations such as{cubs, {scouts}and{guides}appear to be fading out.
